comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4180?focusedCommentId=16745629) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
`[~wesmckinn]` after ARROW-2815, I recommended adding these to mvn commands:

```Java
mvn --quiet -Dlogback.configurationFile=file:${ARROW_HOME}/java/dev/logback.xml
```

That will get rid of almost everything except to show errors/warnings. Want me to update CI for this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4180?focusedCommentId=16745827) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
+1 `[~bryanc]`

I guess the CI change isn't required for gandiva java (travis_script_gandiva_java.sh) because the tests are already picking up the config present in 

java/gandiva/src/test/resources/logback.xml
